info.title: Policy API Reference
info.description:
Reference for the Brightcove Policy API, used to create policy keys to access the Playback API. This API is used to generate keys to access the Playback API outside the context of a Brightcove Player.

Notes:
  • Policy keys are generated automatically for Brightcove Players.
  • To test API requests, you can use our API Testing Tools

post.description: Create a new policy key to access the Playback API

apis.description: Array of APIs that are permitted for this key (currently "search" is the only one available - this must be included to use the search functionality for the Playback API)

allowed-domains.description: For domain restriction, the domains this key will work on

require-ad-config.description: Whether Playback API requests require an ad-config-id URL parameter for server-side ad insertion

countries.description: Array of ISO 3166 list of 2- or 4-letter codes in lower-case (search for "country codes")

exclude_countries.description: If true, country array is treated as a list of countries excluded from viewing. If false, the country array is a list of countries included for viewing.
